description: Number of Mersenne prime exponents between 10^n and 10^(n+1).
links: GIMPS, Great Internet Mersenne Prime Search
example: There are 4 Mersenne prime exponents between 10^0 and 10^1; 6 between 10^1 and 10^2; ... . There are 9 known Mersenne primes between 10^7 and 10^8 so for now, the next entry is 9.
author: _Marvin Ray Burns_, Jun 18 2000; updated Jan 07 2006, Jan 15 2009
